data.text: @JamesVanFleet @RoyalCaribbean Would love to know what this means for Allure now. Since this storm is slowing down you would think Sunday would actually be better instead of extending the current cruise longer. I’m sitting on standby either way but it would be nice to be able to give my employer an update.

data.text: Besides the dioramas, there are also lovely scenic views at the Steven Foster Cultural Center. They are raising money to restore the carillon, which was heavily damaged in a storm. https://t.co/V3nfqkb4dD

tweets.text: AM Update on Hurricane #Dorian for @RoyalCaribbean Guests: Dorian is on the doorstep of Cat 3 strength. Both the Euro and American Models like each other again and are in agreement. Back to a little slower arrival making an eye landfall around #WestPalmBeach Tue 12am-2am. #flwx https://t.co/LyxFufrkvY

entity.name: Tropical Storm Dorian picks up strength as it nears landfall in Puerto Rico
entity.description: Forecasters say Tropical Storm Dorian could reach near-hurricane strength as it makes landfall in Puerto Rico on Wednesday.
